getSupplyLimit(address).details: getter for `supplyLimits` variable  returns supply limit

moduleBurnAction(address,uint256).details: See {IModule-moduleBurnAction}.  no burn action required in this module

moduleMintAction(address,uint256).details: See {IModule-moduleMintAction}.  no mint action required in this module

moduleTransferAction(address,address,uin.details: See {IModule-moduleTransferAction}.  no transfer action required in this module

setSupplyLimit(uint256).details: sets supply limit.  Supply limit has to be smaller or equal to the actual supply.

params._limit: max amount of tokens to be created  Only the owner of the Compliance smart contract can call this function  emits an `SupplyLimitSet` event

documentation.text:
this event is emitted when the supply limit has been set.
  `_compliance` is the compliance address.
  `_limit` is the max amount of tokens in circulation.

@dev See {IModule-moduleTransferAction}.
  no transfer action required in this module

@dev See {IModule-moduleMintAction}.
  no mint action required in this module

@dev See {IModule-moduleBurnAction}.
  no burn action required in this module

@dev getter for `supplyLimits` variable
  returns supply limit
